DOC.brief_title: Granulocyte-macrophage Colony-stimulating Factor , Interferon Interleukin-2 Adjuvant Treatment Renal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients high-risk RCC dismal prognosis . To date , effective adjuvant therapy exist patient category . We suggest combination granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor ( GM-CSF ) , interferon alpha ( IFN ) interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) stimulate immune system dendritic cell till cytotoxic T-lymphocytes step step eliminate residuary tumor cell . This prospective , non-randomized , phase II trial assess low-dose GM-CSF , IFN IL-2 postoperatively patient high-risk renal cell carcinoma .
